title: Full-Stack Web Development
shortDescription: Build modern, scalable web applications from concept to deployment using cutting-edge technologies.

children.text: I specialize in building complete web applications using the latest technologies and best practices. From responsive frontend interfaces to robust backend APIs and database design, I handle every aspect of your web application development needs.

pricing.description: Pricing varies based on project complexity, features, and timeline. Contact for detailed quote.

title: AI Integration & Development
shortDescription: Integrate cutting-edge AI capabilities into your applications using GPT, custom ML models, and more.

children.text: Transform your application with AI capabilities. I help businesses integrate GPT models, build custom machine learning solutions, and implement intelligent features that provide real value to users.

pricing.description: Custom pricing based on AI complexity and usage requirements. Includes initial setup and optimization.

title: Technical Consulting & Architecture
shortDescription: Expert guidance on technology strategy, architecture decisions, and best practices for your projects.

children.text: Get expert advice on your technology decisions, system architecture, and development strategy. I help companies make informed technical decisions that align with their business goals.

pricing.description: Hourly rate for consulting sessions. Package deals available for ongoing engagements.

title: API Development & Integration
shortDescription: Design and build robust RESTful and GraphQL APIs with comprehensive documentation.

children.text: Build scalable, secure, and well-documented APIs for your applications. From design to deployment, I create APIs that are easy to use, maintain, and scale.

pricing.description: Pricing based on API complexity and number of endpoints.

title: E-Commerce Solutions
shortDescription: Build complete e-commerce platforms with payment processing, inventory management, and analytics.

children.text: Launch your online store with a custom e-commerce solution tailored to your business needs. From product catalogs to checkout and order management, I build complete e-commerce experiences.

pricing.description: Custom pricing based on features and scale. Includes initial setup and training.

title: Performance Optimization
shortDescription: Speed up your web applications and improve user experience through comprehensive optimization.

children.text: Slow applications lose users and revenue. I analyze and optimize your web application's performance, from frontend loading times to backend query optimization.

pricing.description: Fixed price for audit and optimization based on application size.
